headerText: The `v-carousel` component is used to display large numbers of visual content on a rotating timer.

usage.desc: A carousel by default has a slide transition.

customTransition.desc: You can also apply your own custom transition.

customIcons.desc: You can also change the icon for the carousel delimiter and previous/next icons.

hideDelimiters.desc: You can hide the bottom controls with the `hide-delimiters` prop.

hideControls.desc: You can hide the navigation controls with the `hide-controls` prop.

props.nextIcon: The displayed icon for forcing pagination to the next item
props.prevIcon: The displayed icon for forcing pagination to the previous item
props.cycle: Determines if carousel should cycle through images
props.hideDelimiters: Hides the panel with carousel delimiters
